article:
Mr. White is a member of his office. He's _ and can easily deal with all kinds of matters. So he's always _ more than his workmates. Of course he's often _ and has no time to do the housework. His wife knows him well and does all at home.
 Bad luck ! Their daughter was hurt in a traffic accident last month and had to be in hospital . Now Mrs. White has to look after her there _ she can't go home. Mr. White often eats something in the restaurant. As he _ did some cleaning, the rooms were all disorderly .
Yesterday morning, before Mr. White got up, the telephone _ . He sat up to answer it. His friend told him to _ an important telephone number down. But he could find neither a pen nor a piece of paper. He found there was much dust  on the table and wrote the number on it. But soon he _ it and went to work. Two hours later his wife came back and looked for a sweater for her daughter. Her husband came in while she was cleaning the table. He couldn't find the number on the table and called out angrily, "Who let you clean the table?"
